Hello,

I was hoping to get some help regarding a 'Tsuba' I have. I know
no=
thing of them, in fact the only reason I know they are called
'Tsubas' is b=
ecause I saw one on television this morning...

I Googled 'Tsuba' and this =
group was one of the first links I found. I
have tried - with difficulty - =
to identify and date my tsuba.

So I thought I would seek help from people =
who know about tsubas and
Japanese swords.
Here is a link to a photograph o=
f it:
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v340/donuil_dhu/_DSC0031.jpg

I thi=
nk it may be bronze. And help I could get with identifying and
dating it wo=
uld be briliant! Thanks in advance!

Patrick
